title: rifattoken
author: rifattoken
content: Hello, I'm Rifat from Bangladesh I just launched an NFT collection name Mad Camels on ethereum chain, the collection has 4500 unique items programmatically generated using Hand-made pixel traits. this is the first ever NFT collection launched from Bangladesh.Its minting live on our official website: madcamels.commint price is only 0.018 ETHGet your own Mad Camels now.
